synopsis.text:
Grand Theft Mecha meets Super Moron Kart in this side-splitting anime extravaganza! The villains from beloved series like Time Bokan, Yatterman, Zenderman, Otasukeman, Yattodetaman, Ippatsuman, and Itadakiman are back, vying for the dubious honor of being crowned the ultimate baddie. The Dorombo Gang and their trusty Kitchen Robot join the fray, determined to outwit, outplay, and outlast their nefarious counterparts in TIME BOKAN: ROYAL REVIVAL.

From the creative minds behind Gatchaman and Speed Racer, this hilarious adventure pits evil against evil in a wacky race to become the meanest villains in anime history. With superheroes like the Gatchaman ninja hot on their heels, the villains must slam, bash, and dirty trick each other to the finish line.

When the anime world announces a remake of a fan-favorite series, a problem arises: who will take the coveted role of the lead villain? The answer? A no-holds-barred competition of evil! Watch as the Dorombo Gang and their kitchen robot go head-to-head with the worst of the worst, all vying for the title of the superheroes' greatest enemy. Will the Gatchaman ninja arrive in time to save the day, or will the villains reign supreme? Join the chaos and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
